topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e2825d6368723d2b290600#post_54e2825d6368723d2b290600
Alright, if you see a mod you like, click on it. There will be a list of cosmetics it can replace. Click on the one you want to use, and there will be a pop-up saying if you want to save it.
It's kinda easy to place, since I'm on a Mac, but for PC, I'm not entirely sure.

Here's the "Gamebanana site with the TF2 part.":http://tf2.gamebanana.com/skins?vl%5Bpage%5D=3&mid=CategoriesList
Right now, the list will be showing random mods, but if you want a specific weapon, use the list to the right, showing the name. Look through the list until you find the one you want, and click it.
You'll be linked to a list with mods/reskins for THAT weapon.

S4 ended May 10 2014, S5 is expected to begin some time in April 2015 if that news is correct
That's *_+11 months+_*

Gravity Falls S1 ended August 2 2013 and S2 began on August 1 2014
That's basically 12 months
